skillTree.localised_description: As the Perfect Prince's dark influence increases, so too do the blessings of His pleasure.
Slaanesh's favoured child has been granted the gift of preternatural swordsmanship.

effects.description:
Enables Soporific Musk attacks for Aspiring Champions and Chosen of Slaanesh
	(Lord's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh and Chosen of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The beatific Mark of Slaanesh is branded into Sigvald's perfect body.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh and Chosen of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Being unable to contemplate anything other than their own perverse needs and desires would be a handicap for anyone else, but not so Sigvald the Magnificent.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is unable to activate abilities or cast spells.

skillTree.localised_description: "I know, I know - I truly am a perfect specimen. Hold the mirror a bit higher… higher! Yes that's right…"
"What think you of this particular suit of armour? I think the gold really captures my best aspects - all of them hahahaha!"
Sigvald inspires fanatical devotion in his followers, for they know that in the aftermath of battle they may sate their most unholy lusts without restraint.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain: +15% for Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Sigvald's sycophantic minions will do anything to stay in his favour, not realising that he cares for none but himself and the attention of the Dark Prince, Slaanesh.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

effects.description:
Attribute: Expendable for all non-character units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Witnessing friendly expendable units rout does not reduce other units' leadership, unless they are themselves expendable.

skillTree.localised_description: On sight of Sigvald's undeniable magnificence the enemy must confront their own obvious inadequacies, and despair.

related_attributes.bullet_text:
Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity

skillTree.localised_description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description: Unit Upgrades cost: -5% for all units
Unit Upgrades cost: -10% for all units

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

skillTree.localised_description: Visions cloud the mind, prophesising the arrival of the enemy and uncovering every shadow in which they lurk.

Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: Few could resist such sultry wiles, drawing so many to corruption's insidious grasp.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

A unit with the Mark of Slaanesh has:
	➕  Immune to Psychology Attribute
	➕  Strider Attribute
	➕ Increased  Physical Resistance
	 ➕ Increased  Speed
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

factionEffects.localised_description: Though he appears to be little more than sixteen summers of age, Sigvald the Magnificent has blighted the world for over three hundred years; the personification of beauty on the outside, but rot within.

effects.description: Souls cost: -25% for all Gifts of Slaanesh
Vassals gain "Immune to Psychology" and spread Slaanesh corruption
Applies and benefits from Seductive Influence and Gifts of Slaanesh

items.colour_text: It is said Prince Sigvald’s ornate sword is forged from a sliver of Slaanesh’s own blade.

item_set.name: Trappings of Excess
item_set.description: Beauty and malice so often go hand in hand.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison
